markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Relentless Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=1396) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 41 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Fiendish Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=1390)

</column>

---

Your wings are now a permanent part of your physiology. You gain the effects of Fiendish Wings at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.
name: Relentless Wings
